creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg
description: man with unkempt hair and beard, seated on a stool, shoulders slumped, wearing a shirt, pants and vest, looking down at a pipe held in his PR hand; glass held in his PL hand; bottle on table behind him
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

lower margin, LRC, in pencil: [Ribot. Th. (underlined) / Une grande douleur. / eau forte originale / tres belle ipr. ecrout la lettre]
provenance: Dr. Gabriel and Yvonne Weisberg, Minneapolis
title: A Great Sadness
